channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 09:50 Pleak to the Zaporizhzhia Oblast. Watch for further messages.
item.description: 游릭 09:50 Pleak to the Zaporizhzhia Oblast. Watch for further messages.#Zaporizhzhia This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 09:47 The threat of shelling! Now in Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community artillery shelling. Walk to shelter!
item.description: 游댮 09:47 The threat of shelling! Now in Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community artillery shelling. Walk to shelter! This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
